description: This file defines server-side request handling logic for a Remix application, including request routing, server-side rendering with streaming, and CORS headers management.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main entry point for handling incoming HTTP requests; sets CORS headers, differentiates bot and browser requests, and routes to respective handlers.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering pipeline for bot requests, utilizing streaming and piping response.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering pipeline for browser requests with streaming.
